    • fromString

      public static PhoneMap fromString​(IPATranscript target, IPATranscript actual, java.lang.String align)
      Utility method for building a PhoneMap object given a string provided by the toString method. Original transcriptions are also required.
      Parameters:
      target -
      actual -
      align - the string representation of the alignment
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the phones found in the align string do not match the give target/actual forms

    • fromString

      public static PhoneMap fromString​(java.lang.String align)
      Construct alignment given the input string. This method constructs the IPATranscript references from the given input.
      Parameters:
      align -
      Returns:
      alignment
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if align is not a valid string
